definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: E. coli O157:H7 causes abdominal cramping, vomiting and a diarrheal illness, often with bloody stools.
sentences.chinese: H7能引起腹部绞痛，呕吐和腹泻，通常是血便。

sentences.english: The majority of patients have vague abdominal pain or discomfort.
sentences.chinese: 多数患者有腹部的隐痛或不适。

sentences.english: If the abdomen, should take the navel as a center.
sentences.chinese: 若是腹部，应以肚脐眼为中心。

sentences.english: The underparts were white with heavy dark streaks down the front.
sentences.chinese: 腹部从前到后有深黑色的条纹。

sentences.english: Do not use when abdominal pain, nausea or vomiting are present.
sentences.chinese: 当腹部感到疼痛时，恶心，呕吐时请勿使用。

sentences.english: Larvae dark gray color, green or weak stomach abdomen only with three and a pair of tail foot.
sentences.chinese: 幼虫深灰绿或淡青色，腹部仅有腹足三对及尾足一对。

sentences.english: I absolutely will not wear a tummy revealing shirt without slathering this stuff on first.
sentences.chinese: 现在我在穿腹部瘦身衣之前，一定要先涂这个东西的。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the role of enteral nutrition in the treatment of gastroparesis after abdominal operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肠内营养在腹部手术后胃瘫治疗中的作用。

sentences.english: Diagnosis of leakage was made by clinical features or abdominal CT-scans.
sentences.chinese: 吻合口瘘的诊断主要依据临床表现和腹部CT。

sentences.english: We report a case pre-senting as abdominal masses with unilateral pleural seeding.
sentences.chinese: 我们要报告一例以腹部肿瘤表现并单侧肋膜转移。

sentences.english: Abdominal tenderness is noted, and pelvic examination reveals cervical motion tenderness.
sentences.chinese: 腹部压痛明显，盆腔检查提示宫颈摇摆痛。

sentences.english: They are usually round with short wing covers (elytra) that expose the end of the abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 虫体一般呈圆形，鞘翅短，腹部末端露出。

sentences.english: The gases may puff up the belly in particular.
sentences.chinese: 气体尤其会在腹部鼓胀起来。

sentences.english: Her throat and lower abdomen were slashed.
sentences.chinese: 咽喉和下腹部各有一道伤口。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the anesthesia methods and management of the patients with epigastrium operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨糖尿病患者上腹部手术麻醉的方法。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the diagnostic value of spiral CT in pancreas ampulla carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨壶腹部癌的螺旋CT诊断价值。

definition: back (of a human or other vertebrate, or of an object)
the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
the four limbs of the body
